D3 water drop chart

D3 Water Drop Chart, a very simple chart created with a single stacked bar chart inside a Water Drop body

D3 Water Drop Chart

D3 Water Drop Chart is a very simple chart created with a single stacked bar chart inside a Water Drop body.

Usage / Samples

Dependencies

  • D3 version 3.5.*
